text: Caravan (Russian and Kazahk: Караван) is a Kazakhstani Russian-language newspaper published in Almaty. It is a weekly paper. Caravan was founded in 1991. It focuses on the social, political and economic life of Kazakhstan. The circulation is 225,000 copies. The newspaper has won several prizes. Category:Newspapers in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Kazakhstan Category:Newspapers in Europe
title: Caravan (newspaper)
